title: connection aggravations

embed.description: You can hear the shit going on, connecting...

body:
I am connected to the internet, speeds good enough for LoL, I can HEAR stuff happening in-game... Can't connect. 15 minutes and I reset client and it worked. We lost. As far as I could tell everyone reports me, because apparently this is my fault.

Then I get to talk to support and listen to them tell me that it's because I don't have internet connection. Well, hopefully a damn video will convince you that I DO indeed have internet connection. It's not amazing, but it's good enough to play some damn LoL.

replies.body: This attempting to reconnect message indicates that your connection might be unstable.  Your internet itself might be good, but how you're connecting to the game server might not be.  Something is likely causing your connection specifically to the game server to cut off, but the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help you out here and clear up the snags.  I hope that helps!
So it seems more like there was a some coding that tweaked out when attempting to reconnect
Well once I exit the game and reconnected after it not being able to reconnect properly it logged in and played the last 10 minutes or so of the game were fine.
